title: Trimming, 18th century
medium: White and colored silks in uncut velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Castles set between a large X and an ornament formed by line nebulae, purple and yellow on white ground, with borders of alternating red and yellow bands.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, 18th century.
18th century. White and colored silks in uncut velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-56.
